tasks.task: Find the cheapest round-trip flight from San Francisco (SFO) to New York (JFK) departing on March 15, 2025 and returning on March 22, 2025. Use Google Flights.
Find a hotel in Manhattan, New York for 2 adults from March 15-22, 2025 with a rating of 4 stars or higher and price under $300/night. Use Booking.com or Hotels.com.
Plan a detailed 3-day itinerary for New York City including must-see attractions, restaurants, and transportation between locations. Research on TripAdvisor or similar sites.
